H0.text: In which constellation is the star 'Betelguese'. Canis Major

H1.text: In which constellation is the star 'Betelguese'. Cassiopeia

H2.text: In which constellation is the star 'Betelguese'. Ursa Major

H3.text: In which constellation is the star 'Betelguese'. ORION

A5.text: Orion's two brightest stars, Rigel (β) and Betelgeuse (α), are both among the brightest stars in the night sky
